  • Variables

    • PLAYER_NAME
      • PLAYER_GENDER

      # Variables

      # PLAYER_NAME

      • Type: string
      • Returns: The player's name

      # PLAYER_GENDER

      • Type: string
      • Possible values: m, f
      • Returns: The player's gender
